seniority_level.evidence: Title explicitly states 'Senior Data Engineer' and requires 4+ years of experience with at least 2 years in data operations/infrastructure

job_family.evidence: Title is 'Senior Data Engineer' and responsibilities focus on data pipelines, storage, and analytics infrastructure

sub_specialty.evidence: Mentions both ETL/ELT (batch) and data streaming platforms (Kafka, Kinesis) as nice-to-have, with no heavy emphasis on either

leadership_expectation.evidence: Mentions mentoring, contributing to team norms, and designing integrated systems, but no direct reports or people management responsibilities

primary_cloud.evidence: AWS mentioned explicitly in qualifications and must-have skills (AWS, AWS Athena)

secondary_clouds.evidence: Other clouds (Azure, GCP) mentioned as examples but not emphasized

processing_paradigm.evidence: ETL/ELT (batch) mentioned as must-have, and Kafka/Kinesis (streaming) mentioned as nice-to-have, with no clear primary focus

orchestrator_category.evidence: Dagster, Airflow, and Prefect mentioned explicitly as must-have orchestration tools, with Dagster listed first

storage_layer.evidence: Mentions datalake technologies (must-have) and AWS Athena (data warehousing), with familiarity in Iceberg (lakehouse) as nice-to-have

remote_restriction.evidence: Hybrid work model requires in-person attendance at Boston, MA office two days a week

timezone_focus.evidence: No timezone restrictions or preferences explicitly stated beyond hybrid work requirement in Boston, MA

relocation_required.evidence: Hybrid work model implies flexibility but does not mention relocation support or requirement

h1b_friendly.evidence: No explicit mention of H1B sponsorship in the job posting or Pass 1 extraction

opt_cpt_friendly.evidence: Job posting states commitment to diversity but does not explicitly mention OPT/CPT support, and requires work authorization

citizenship_required.evidence: Job posting explicitly states 'actively seek applications from all individuals' and 'no matter how they identify', implying no citizenship restrictions

w2_vs_1099.evidence: Full-time employment type and benefits mentioned strongly suggest W2 contract

benefits_level.evidence: Mentions a comprehensive total rewards package, equity, and Employee Resource Groups (ERGs) with networking/mentorship opportunities

growth_path_clarity.evidence: Mentions learning and growth are continuous, and a collaborative environment where growth is encouraged

mentorship_signals.evidence: Mentions 'Lift As We Climb' value and ERGs for mentoring, but no formal mentorship program explicitly stated

promotion_path_mentioned.evidence: No explicit mention of promotion paths or advancement in the job posting

internal_mobility_mentioned.evidence: No discussion of internal mobility or role changes in the job posting

career_tracks_available.evidence: Role focuses on technical leadership and IC responsibilities, mentions contributing to team norms but no direct management track

requirement_strictness.evidence: Multiple 'must have' skills listed with clear qualifiers, fewer nice-to-have skills mentioned

scope_definition.evidence: Job description and responsibilities are well-defined and focused on data engineering tasks

skill_inflation_detected.evidence: Skill requirements align well with the seniority level inferred (4+ years for senior role)
